name: Huenison
description: Innovative arcade shooter that takes various elements from many classic and less-known games, and puts them together in a hectic mix. All in retro visuals and synthetic sonorities that recall the revered Commodore 64's SID chip.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 32 bit, 500 MHz Memory: 12 MB RAM Graphics: 32 bit Storage: 32 MB available space Sound Card: 16 bit
recommended_requirements: Processor: 800 MHz Additional Notes: internet connection

reviews.review_text: Wow, this game is great. Its like a cross between space invaders, arkanoid and tetris. It's a hectic and fast paced arcade game with puzzley elements. Ha! it's bloody hard to describe, you'll just have to play it. Also, the soundtrack is AMAZING!
